metadata.title: CVE-2022-3819 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An improper authorization issue in GitLab CE/EE affecting all versions from15.0 prior to 15.3.5, 15.4 prior to 15.4.4, and 15.5 prior to 15.5.2 allowsa malicious users to set emojis on internal notes they don't have accessto.

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
